masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Your mentor—the hero who trained you—is expecting something for Christmas. But what do you get for someone who has everything? Who's saved the world a dozen times? Who once caught a meteor with their bare hands? A gift card feels... inadequate."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Find a gift that actually means something
  • It doesn't have to be expensive—just thoughtful
  • Maybe the gift is symbolic of how far you've come
